TopicTitle: Reset editing actions for offset/rotate gizmos for ATTACHED parts

Articles.Content:
It may be helpful to add option to reset part offset/rotation using alt-click or similar. Using middle-click alone is not good as it is used to scroll camera.

Edited January 26, 2015 by fatcargo
clarification
That applies to DETACHED parts. My idea aims on parts still attached to craft/construction. Should have been clearer though. Changed title of first post accordingly.
